alert.note: Alert for Charlotte (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 2:32PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Charlotte County through 300 PM EDT... At 232 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cullen, or near Charlotte Court House, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Charlotte Court House... Madisonville... Abilene... and Cullen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
